channel.title: Writing on aron online!
channel.description: Recent content in Writing on aron online!

item.title: about
item.description: me: i’m 20 and i use he/him pronouns. i’m currently an environmental engineering student at northeastern. the contents of this website could probably demonstrate more about me than i could succinctly summarize myself. this website: this is a centralized online location for my thoughts, projects, and reviews that i expect to be viewed sparingly. aron.nyc is a static website built with hugo using the hugo-classic theme and hosted via github pages (but one day i’ll self-host it).

item.title: cars
item.description: originally written in december 2021 rugged individualism is the frequently touted idea that in the united states, you succeed solely on your own merits, accepting no handouts. the philosophy has been steadily ingrained in the american psyche since the conception of the country, which was sold to immigrants as a place where social and economic mobility exists through hard work alone. most will be familiar with the concept by another glamorized term: the “american dream”.
